venue.name: NEGLAA/ New England Gallery of Latin American Art

item.description:
Saludos a mis compañeros de Spanish meetup!

Este evento no es un evento completamente en español, pero habrá oportunidades para los que quieren. Esta causa es muy querida por mí, y espero que vayan. La idea es darles chance a los niños minoridades urbanos que vayan al campo (en las montañas Berkshire de MA) a conocer la naturaliza en una comunidad abierta y cariñosa.

(ESTE EVENTO ESTA PUESTO EN VARIOS SITIOS. ESTAMOS ESPERANDO 80-100 PERSONAS EN TOTAL.)

---

Enjoy the company of great friends accompanied by great music and great food for a great cause- help send urban minority kids to camp!

While you're there, enjoy the art and the outdoor patio.

---

Entertainment:
Rodney Mashia is a singer, songwriter, flautist, dancer and computer consultant. He draws upon his background as a person of color growing up in New Orleans in the 50s and 60s, with the goal of bringing diversity awareness to the camp.
---

Delicious catered appetizers and sweets courtesy of Max Ultimate Food

Wine, beer, coffee and soft drinks will also be provided.
*Beer donated by Sam Adams Brewery.

---
Cool *AUCTION/ RAFFLE* items- including:

A weekend at Rowe Conference Center
Blue Man Tickets
VIP passes to the Boston Latino International Film Festival
Chocolee Chocolate
Photographs
Paintings
Gift baskets
Handmade jewelry and crafts

Gift certificates for...
Tremont 647 in the South End
Jeff Levin Massage and Bodywork
Card-making class at Paper Source

---
Tickets! (at the door)
$35 for adults
$18 for students
--

Cant go but want to donate?
www.rowecenter.org
(Mention "Boston Woodside")
---

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Latin American Art and Cool People for a Great Cause, Food & Drinks included
